Description

"Story Of Infinity: Xia"is A martial arts style Roguelike adventure A·RPG standalone game. According to their own carry different martial arts into the copy, with different weapons, secrets, role growth, to achieve a lively sense of attack through the random fantasy map, explore the background of the whole Reiki world.

Core System

There are hundreds of items in the game, including martial arts, weapons, secrets, heritage, treasures, etc., all with unique backstories. Try different combinations, you can play the best of each character, and clear the fantasy more easily.

Characters

Each character has a different martial arts inclination and story setting, also has a different talent, good use of each character differences, the game can be easier!


Random Map

Each time you enter the Fantasy, the composition of the battle rooms on each floor is random, and sometimes getting through may require a bit of luck.



Weapon

Sometimes, having a good weapon is half the battle!



Inheritance

Please carefully choose every martial arts inheritance enhancement, it will directly affect whether you can pass the customs!



Secret Book

Collect lots of different items to discover the truth of this world!


Equipment development

Using dungeon materials to unlock and create equipment can significantly improve the efficiency of exploration
